metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5282 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Docker before 1.3 does not properly validate image IDs, which allows remote attackers to redirect to another image through the loading of untrusted images via 'docker load'.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5282` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.3.0~dfsg1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> fix was released in 1.3 version

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0~dfsg1-1').
